fadderullan.title: Fadderullan
fadderullan.description: Fadderullan is BISO’s welcome festival – created by volunteers from every campus to make it easy to meet new people and feel at home.
highlights: Concerts and daytime happenings on every campus
Dedicated crew for safety, welfare and accessibility
Support for low-threshold and inclusive activities

sections.title: Create memorable first impressions
sections.body: Fadderullan is the first meeting between new students and BISO. Welcome ceremonies, themed events and daytime activities showcase the breadth of our student community.

sections.title: A national effort, delivered locally
sections.body: The festival is coordinated nationally but executed by local volunteers. That ensures a professional setup, solid routines and extensive support.

winter-games.title: Winter Games
winter-games.description: Winter Games brings BI students together for skiing, after-ski and community building. The destination rotates and is delivered by an experienced volunteer crew.
highlights: Shared lodging and activities across campuses
Programmes for both beginners and experienced skiers
Safety team and health preparations from BISO

sections.title: Experiences for every skill level
sections.body: Instruction, guided runs and social arenas make the trip accessible whether it is your first time on skis or your fiftieth.

sections.title: Build a national network
sections.body: Transport and housing are coordinated to help you connect with students from every campus.

karrieredagene.title: Karrieredagene
karrieredagene.description: Karrieredagene connects students and employers through stands, workshops and interview programmes.
highlights: Company presentations, stands and speed interviews
Workshops on CV, applications and case training
Dedicated tracks for international and English-speaking students

sections.title: Tailored to each campus
sections.body: Every campus showcases its local business community while national partners join across the country.

sections.title: For every stage of your journey
sections.body: From your first volunteer role to your first full-time position, you will find coaching and opportunities that match your goals.

inspire.title: Inspire
inspire.description: Inspire is BISO’s talk and storytelling platform where students, alumni and partners share experiences and insight.
highlights: Panels and keynotes from industry leaders and alumni
Stories from student leaders and entrepreneurs
Opportunities to pitch your own projects

sections.title: Stories from our community
sections.body: Inspire highlights initiatives, intrapreneurship and lessons learned from BISO’s own projects.

sections.title: Meet mentors and partners
sections.body: The stage creates a direct link to partners, mentors and potential sponsors.

schedule.title: Campus schedule
schedule.subtitle: Details are updated continuously and may change.

fallback.description: More information will be published soon. Check back for the latest updates.
